summary: This mod adds a Dai-katana and Katana sword
descriptionHtml:
================================================== Changelog V1.1 =======================================================

- black texture for both swords (simple change of lightness and saturation of texture from High Resoulution pack)

========================================================================================================================

This mod adds a Dai-katana and Katana sword. They are obtained through smithing, and they require ebonysmithing perk to craft.
They do require leather strips, ebony ingots and corundum ingot to make.Can be improved (with corundum ingot) and enchanted.
These weapons are not OP (overpowered) They have similar stats as ebony sword and greatsword.
author: zajkoajko

files.name: Craftable and Enchantable Katana and Dai Katana
